# Style Comparison Gallery

This gallery showcases all 120 style combinations and context comparisons generated by `style_comparison.py`.

## Context Comparison

Comparison of the same style (whitegrid + colorblind) across all 4 contexts showing size and spacing differences.

![Context Comparison](style_comparison_output/context_comparison.png)

## Complete Style Combinations

All 120 combinations of 5 styles × 6 palettes × 4 contexts, organized by base style.

---

**Generated by:** `examples/style_comparison.py`  
**Output directory:** `examples/style_comparison_output/`  
**Total plots:** 121 (120 combinations + 1 context comparison)  
**LaTeX notation:** ✅ All mathematical symbols properly formatted
